meanings.definition: A person who rides on a sled.
meanings.sent1: The sledders glided down the snowy hill with big smiles.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of sledders having fun in the park.
meanings.sent3: The sledders raced each other, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent4: The sledders were like colorful birds flying down the hill.
meanings.sent5: The children pretended to be sledders, zooming through the imaginary snow.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the sledders enjoying the winter weather.
meanings.sent2: The sledders gathered at the top of the hill, ready for their ride.
meanings.sent3: The sledders formed a line, eager to take their turn.
meanings.sent4: The sledders' laughter echoed through the snowy valley.
meanings.sent5: The sledders' colorful sleds brightened up the white landscape.
